document.full_text: the world's biggest video game publishers, in a surprise move after years of rocky relations with nintendo, threw their weight behind the japanese company's new wii u console this week.
document.title: videogame publishers in surprise move back nintendo
lines_and_colors: the world's biggest video game publishers, in a surprise move after years of rocky relations with nintendo, threw their weight behind the japanese company's new wii u console this week.
